Install MongoDB
~~~~
# install PyMongo
conda install pymongo=3.3.0 -n py36
# install MongoDB
conda install mongodb=3.3.9 -n py36
# start mongodb
sudo -i
mkdir -p /data/db
chown \<user\> /data/db
mongod --dbpath /data/db &
pgrep mongod
~~~~

NOTE: [mongodb production notes](https://docs.mongodb.com/manual/administration/production-notes/)
